KIS also had this issue, [@IgorZ](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/155445-igorz/) has solved it by increasing the renderQueue number. You can view the **[issue](https://github.com/KospY/KIS/issues/121)** and the **[fix](https://github.com/KospY/KIS/commit/4187eaa84f759f35f903860d9a845ef7a24f44ee)** on Github.

[@Felbourn](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/97344-felbourn/)i noticed that there is not a finer step value than 0.01 units yet frequently some parts require for the nodes to be aligned within 0.001 units. Would be possible to add another button for the "0.001" stepping?
